QuestData.Title: Bring Him Some...
QuestData.Description:
<Mrrl points at your backpack then draws some pictures in the sand. He pulls out a pretty object from behind a rock then furiously points to himself then back at you then your bag.
You believe it might want to make a trade.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Mrrl 4 Healthy Murloc Lunches, 3 Bags of Who-Knows-What, and 6 Sea Giant Foot Dust.
